Our board also leads our culture of safe, inclusive and quality care services. It operates under our constitution and according to our governance policy manual.

Work with us

You can turn your career into your calling at Bethany Christian Care.

If you have a call on your life to serve older Australians, we want to hear from you. We will support you, give you opportunities to grow, and celebrate with you as you enable our residents to live abundantly.
